CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "Ortho"),Registration_fee__c*0.85+ Registration_fee__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "pedia"), Registration_fee__c*1.21+ Registration_fee__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "Cardio"), Registration_fee__c*1.33+ Registration_fee__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "dermatology"), Registration_fee__c*1.56+ Registration_fee__c,IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "hematology"), Registration_fee__c*0.100+ Registration_fee__c,0)))))
CustomField.label: Total Amount
